description: The iconic trucker jacket gets a cold weather update with hardy denim and high-pile fleece lining.
fitting_details: Size Big 2X has a 26½" front body length, a 27" back body length, a 23½" shoulder, a 58" chest, and a 26¾" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes ½" between sizes.
Size Tall 2L has a 28½" front body length, a 29" back body length, a 23½" shoulder, a 58" chest, and a 28¼" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes 1" between sizes.
Long sleeves with snapped barrel cuffs. American flag patch at the left sleeve.
Two chest snapped pockets. Two front waist angled pockets. "Polo" label at the left chest pocket.
Adjustable buttoned tabs at the back waist. Fully lined. Body is lined with high-pile fleece.
Shell: cotton. Collar and body lining: polyester, arcylic. Sleeve lining: cupro.
Due to the natural characteristics of this material, the coloring may rub off onto fabrics and upholstery.
